thread.title_full: You get what you pay for - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bkoehler
title: You get what you pay for - Review
text: Location is great and it is very affordable but you get what you pay for! We stayed one night and didn't sleep a bit! The walls are paper thin. In one adjacent room we heard a man coughing all night and in the other adjacent room we heard a group of college students come in at 3:30 am and party in their room until 5 am! My kids didn't sleep at all! Also, neither TV worked. Called front desk for a repair but neither was fixed. Next time I will pay more for a room at another hotel with better insulation and a quieter setting. A good deal is not so good if you don't get any sleep!
